text: If a person wants more privacy when using the bathroom, what structure in the picture can be closed to separate the bathroom from the outside environment?
If someone requires additional privacy while using the bathroom, which area of the picture could be closed to isolate the bathroom from the outside environment?
What structure in the picture can be closed to provide more privacy to a person using the bathroom and separate it from the outside environment?
What structure, visible in the picture, can be closed to provide more privacy when using the bathroom?
To curtail interference and improve privacy when using the bathroom, what item in the picture can be closed to partition the bathroom from the outdoors?
What structure in this picture can a person close to increase privacy while using the bathroom and separate it from the outside environment?
